email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000MT, and we are offering a lumpsum freight rate of USD 450,000 on CIF terms.

The vessel is the PACIFIC WAVE, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is flexible, but we are aiming for a loading window in early October.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The lumpsum rate seems a bit high for our budget. Could you provide a breakdown of the rate and confirm if there is any room for negotiation?

Additionally, could you specify the laycan dates and the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Chartering Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your response. The lumpsum rate includes freight, insurance, and all port charges. However, considering your feedback, we can reduce the rate to USD 430,000.

The laycan is from 2023-10-05 to 2023-10-15, and the demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 430,000 is more acceptable. However, we would like to confirm the laytime start and end dates, as well as the demurrage rate.

Could you also confirm if the vessel has any restrictions on loading or discharging?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Chartering Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-05 and end on 2023-10-15. The demurrage rate remains at USD 8,000 per day. The PACIFIC WAVE has no restrictions on loading or discharging coal.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable, and we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Chartering Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have proceeded with the booking and will send you the final documents shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers
